meanings.definition: A person or thing that attracts.
meanings.sent1: The attracter of the group was the talented singer.
meanings.sent2: The shiny new toy was a great attracter for the children.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was the main attracter at the pet adoption event.
meanings.sent4: Her positive energy was like an attracter, drawing people towards her.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers in the garden acted as a natural attracter for butterflies.

meanings.definition: A device or substance that attracts.
meanings.sent1: The magnet was a powerful attracter of metal objects.
meanings.sent2: The attracter in the trap lured the pests inside.
meanings.sent3: The attracter spray brought all the bees to the yard.
meanings.sent4: The attracter emitted a sweet scent that attracted birds from afar.
meanings.sent5: The attracter in the fishing lure mimicked the movement of a real fish.

meanings.definition: An object or feature that draws attention.
meanings.sent1: The bright neon sign was the main attracter of the store.
meanings.sent2: The unique architecture of the building served as an attracter for tourists.
meanings.sent3: The attracter on the billboard made everyone stop and stare.
meanings.sent4: Her contagious laughter was an attracter in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The giant statue was the ultimate attracter at the park.
